div.bibl: Scrapbook, Vol. 11, of Dr, H. R. Krasnow, 4601 N. Broadway, Chicago, Ill. CELEBRATION OF HUNDREDTH ANNIVERSARY OF BIRTH OF KARL MARX

body.p: The Russian Social-Democratic Club held an anniversary celebration of the hundredth anniversary of the birth of Marx. There were speeches on Marx and his work, a concert and dances.
Mr. A. Pokatilov, gave a reading.
This was held May 4, 1918, at Deering Club Hall, located at 1734 Fuller-ton Avenue.
